column4: Hey, is there a resource somewhere that lists all of these vital, need to know config files like sources.list?
not that i know of...the config files vary greatly depending on what you're doing.  they all go in /etc for the most part if that helps.
The path to Ubuntu enlightenment appears to be a form of osmosis :)
like i said, it really depends on what you're doing.  not like windows has a listing of ALL the ways to configure every piece of software.  sure there's the registry, but that's just a kludge.
